Results
As can be seen , NCP improves upon vanilla encoderdecoder models ( ED + JC , ED + CC ) , irrespective of the copy mechanism being employed .

comparable scores.from sentence: In fact , NCP achieves comparable scores with either joint or conditional copy mechanism which indicates that it is the content planner which brings performance improvements .

best content selection and content order.from sentence: Overall , NCP + CC achieves best content selection and content ordering scores in terms of BLEU .

template - based system.from sentence: As far as the template - based system is concerned , we observe that it obtains low BLEU and CS precision but scores high on CS recall and RG metrics .

best reported system.from sentence: Compared to the best reported system in Wiseman et al. , we achieve an absolute improvement of approximately 12 % in terms of relation generation ; content selection precision also improves by 5 % and recall by 15 % , content ordering increases by 3 % , and BLEU by 1.5 points .
